Name: Posting information on the exterior of vehicles for hire.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to posting information on the exterior of vehicles for hire.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Transportation
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
Section 1. Chapter 5 of title 19 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new section 19-538 to read as follows:
19-538. Posting of information on the exterior of vehicles for hire.  a.  The commission shall require that one decal displaying the rate of fare be placed on each exterior rear door of any vehicle authorized to accept a street hail.
b.  The commission shall require that one decal containing the word “TAXI” be placed on each exterior front door of any taxicab.
§ 2. This local law shall take effect immediately.
